title: Remodeled Apartment in Pacific Heights with Incredible Views
posting_body: 2275 Broadway #521-Remodeled Apartment in Pacific Heights with Incredible Views
~Prices subject to change~
This polished home is in one of the most sought-after locations in San Francisco.
The updated kitchen has a gas-range stove, a dishwasher, and a farmhouse sink.
Relax in your spacious living room with a fireplace, built-in shelves, bright bay windows, and hardwood floors.
In-unit laundry and plenty of closet space complete this masterpiece.
For days you want to soak in the sun, pet-friendly Lafayette Park is minutes away, and your neighborhood hangouts include the Salt & Straw, Roam Artisan Burgers, Hollow Cow, and Woodhouse Fish Co.
This is what city living is all about.
Pets Allowed - 40 pounds or less and no aggressive breeds
$40 per month for each pet
Utilities not included
Renters insurance required
